page.title: 05OCCUPATION OF SCHOOL PARENTS
page.content:
1.Number of families-41 2.No. of fathers unemployed-4(9.75%) 3.No. of workers in Dyke Area-8(19.5%) 4.No. of workers outwith catchment area-14(34%) 5.No. of workers in school catchment area-15(36.5%) 6.No. of occupations-22 7.Headings of Occupations
1.Agricultural-forester,gamekeeper,far mer,estate factor,gardener,groundsman(41.4%) 2.Building-builder,greenhouse builder(7.3%) 3.Transport-haulage contracter,bus controller.(7.3%) 4.Education-headmaster.(2.4%) 5.Service Units-coalman,chef,clerical,caravan site manager.(9.7%) 6.Communications-British Telecom(2.4%)
